alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; East Bay Interior Valleys; North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 9:44PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Showers will impact portions of southeastern Marin, northwestern Alameda, northwestern San Mateo, west central Contra Costa and San Francisco Counties through 1015 PM PST... At 944 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking showers along a line extending from near San Francisco to Millbrae to 6 miles southwest of El Granada. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Francisco, Oakland, Berkeley, Richmond, Daly City, San Mateo, Redwood City, Alameda, South San Francisco, San Bruno, Pacifica, Foster City, Burlingame, San Carlos, Belmont, El Cerrito, Millbrae, Albany, Half Moon Bay and Hillsborough. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
